contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 27, 1924 D Crystal Palace (Grand Shield)
Crystal Palace (Grand Shield) 120 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) crystal-palace-grand-shield
Second
Oliver Cromwell
Crystal Palace (North Tower Gardens Bandstand), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK Presumably George Hawkins didn't both adjudicate and conduct Silksworth Colliery! The programme gives "G. Hawkins" in both roles - was there maybe another conductor of that name active at this period?
Prizes £30, £20, £15.
May 2, 2010, 9:55 p.m. March 4, 2015, 4:25 p.m.
